start_dialogue: ^Aiyoh… these birds ah, so noisy every morning… not even let one old lady sleep longer a bit
^Mynah outside, coo-coo, chit-chit, like got big announcement, like Prime Minister want to speak
^Where my specs go ah? These eyes, not so sharp like last time…
^Ah, there you are, always run and hide in the night
^Hah, good morning, mynahs. You all very hardworking, eh?
^Don’t know what you all talk about every morning, but so steady one, chit-chit, never miss a day
^Hmmmm... let me look at my to-do list on the wall
